meta_title: What Does Automated Mean? Definition & Industrial Context
meta_description: Automated systems utilize technology to execute processes with minimal human input. Understand the definition, industrial applications, and the automation maturity model.
title: What Is Automated? Definition and Industrial Application

hero_image.alt: Hero image for What Is Automated? Definition and Industrial Application

image_prompt: A professional, wide-angle shot of a modern 2026 smart factory floor. In the foreground, a diverse pair of maintenance engineers in high-visibility PPE and hardhats are looking at a sleek, industrial-grade tablet that displays a holographic-style dashboard of machine health. In the background, robotic arms are precisely assembling components under clean, bright LED lighting. The environment is organized, high-tech, and emphasizes the synergy between human oversight and automated machinery. No text.
